title: Summoners Society Growing FB group and Discord!
body:
Hey guys,

Summoners Society is one the bigger active facebook groups! We run online events every month and customs games in our discord! Every month we run a creative competition for those of us who are actually creative ;) ! But in general we have some pretty cool conversation and have a lot of fun.

We are growing pretty fast. The more people that we get the more awesome live and online events we get to run and help grow the community even more!

So come check us out if you are interested!

facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/

Peace

replies.body:
Don't believe them, they are a bunch of self serving idiots. They kicked me from the group because I wanted to promote the game through my 1v1 tournaments. Every other group on facebook I have spoken to have been more than helpful in this regard. 

Their are much better groups than this bunch of clowns.

Hey Dungeon Warlord,

You weren't kicked from wanting to promote your tournaments. You where kicked for not following rules and be rude to admins multiple times. As for your tournament not being shared in the group, the admin that approves them was unwell and had the flu for 2 weeks and in that time you where removed from the group because you where posting toxic comments on the page. 

We are sorry you experience with SumSoc was not a pleasant one, you can always message an admin. We can always lift the ban if you can show that you will no longer break rules or be toxic. We keep screen shots of everything, so we happy to show how you broke the rules, explain and clear everything up! 

Summoners Society is very focused on keeping the group clean from Toxic behaviour. 

Have an awesome day and good luck with your 1 v 1 tournaments! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

This appears to be a personal dispute between you and the organisers of this community. As such, I think it's most appropriate to resolve any issues between the parties involved in a more private channel, aside from the Boards.

If you have any questions related to the Boards guidelines, please review the guidelines described on the left-hand side of this page, as well as the Boards [**Universal Rules**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules).

Hey Wuks,

When Dungeon Warlord posted his comment, I sent a private chat straight away. We also reported it the comment to Riot as well. We agree this is not appropriate place to discuss this issue. 

Thank you,

SumSoc

The moderation team has received the report, and we'll be keeping an eye on this thread to ensure that the back-and-forth here does not escalate. I certainly do hope that y'all can resolve any standing issues!

I tried to talk to admin on more than one occasion. I gave you over a week to process my request from the form you made me fill out(no reply). I requested another form to fill out, as this is the process you told me to follow. 

Your response was to kick me from the group so honestly I don't want to be a part of it. I stand by my previous opinion.

Hey Dungeon Warlord, 

We understand your frustration but Summoners Society is not at the whim of your personal needs.  The admin was unwell and basically away for two weeks with a very bad flu, in that time instead of being patient you where toxic in the group, which it was lead you to being removed. It had nothing to do with your tournament. It was not the first time you where toxic with in the group or in the discord. 

Your response to when things don't go your way is to become toxic, which isn't fair on the admins or the community to be a part of that. 

If you ever do one to come back work things, your always welcome! Sorry we couldn't change you mind, but as you can see on our end there is no ill feelings. 

Have an awesome day and good luck with everything! 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
